infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: ChatzOne needs camera access for profile pictures and video calls
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: ChatzOne needs microphone access for voice messages and video calls
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: ChatzOne needs photo library access to share images
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: ChatzOne uses location to find nearby matches

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow ChatzOne to access your camera for profile pictures and video calls.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow ChatzOne to access your photos to share images.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow ChatzOne to save photos to your library.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow ChatzOne to use your location to find nearby matches.
